review.reviewBody: Got the spaghetti and meatballs and boy was it delicious! Only problem is the food quality is inconsistent but when it's good, it's REALLY good!
I had the Signature Lasagna and the Truffle Forest Mushroom Pasta and both were really good although the lasagna was not really hot.
10/10 authentic italian food, can't go wrong ordering from here

The The Beehive Pizza was great, and the Prawn Pesto was also awesome! However the Classic Alfredo tasted like just butter and no cheese. We usually order the alfredo and it is great but unf it was not this time.
